section_title: Emissions resulting from fuel used in international aviation and maritime transportation
sentences: Contact group Co-Chair Greg Terrill (Australia) introduced the draft conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2003/L.2), which the SBSTA then adopted.

In these conclusions, the SBSTA invites the International Maritime Organization, International Civil Aviation Organization and UNFCCC Secretariats to set up two expert meetings before SBSTA-20 to discuss options to improve the methodologies for estimating and reporting emissions from international aviation and maritime transportation.
